title: Aural set, soprano/piano - phrase 4 ending key

content.prompt: Relative to the overall tonic, phrase 4 ends in what key?

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements
